0: Very comfortable helpful staff very happy with the fitness room with not luxury but excellent range of equipment free weights weight balls yoga ball treadmills elipticals stationary bikes etc
Went to the nearby Oasis Day Spa for massages and Gabrielas for dinner
The hotel itself was lovely gym was good which is important to myself and my husband
Great value nice clean sports bar downstairs good food
Been staying here since I was a kid still great near all attractions good sized rooms comfy beds great views from the rooftop bar big plus is washing facilities on premises and gym
The hotel is nice and clean and the gym is well equipped for a hotel gym
Other niceties included a wine reception happy hour in the evenings and a passable gym with some machines and free weights in addition to the normal cardio equipment
Coffee is available in the room and there is a nice gym to workout in
The area is great quiet and not far from all activities
1: The fitness room too could do with better cleaning
there is a small gym that is got most of what you need for a decent workout during your stay
With the resort fee however you have access to decent Wifi the gym wine tastings and 10 of snacks from the snack bar
There were 4 treadmills cross trainers and weights that I remember
DAILY facility fee which gets you a bunch of stuff that should have been included anyway like the fitness room or stuff you do not want like up to 10 worth of junk food in the hotels lobby
I did n’t need or want anything that I was forced to pay for fitness center wine hour snack “ cupboard ”
Although I usually exercise on vacation for some reason I never get a workout in in NYC perhaps because there is always so much else to do
So skip the gym there is a sauna in the hotel
We were told there was a fitness center but it was closed
You should get the fitness center equipment operating properly including the video
